entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 7:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 18 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 18 inland. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
